IBD Stock Of The Day
Stock Of The Day Forms New Buy Point. You Probably Never Heard Of The Firm.
Licensing
JUAN CARLOS ARANCIBIA
01:44 PM ET 07/28/2025
StoneX Group StoneX Group SNEX $ 95.46 $0.88 0.93% 56% IBD Stock Analysis Forms handle after breakout from cup base stumbles. Buy point at 99.08. Composite Rating 97/99 Industry Group Ranking 33/197 Emerging Pattern Cup with Handle Cup with Handle A positive chart pattern named such because it resembles the outline of a coffee cup with a handle. The pattern…
